enableStorageControl.label: Speicher-Steuerung aktivieren
enableStorageControl.help: Aktiviert die Speicher-Anbindung. Ohne Aktivierung schreibt der Adapter keine Werte in den Speicher.

diagnostics.enabled.label: Enable diagnostics logging
diagnostics.enabled.help: Enables additional debug/info logs and optional diagnostics states.

diagnostics.writeStates.label: Write diagnostics states
diagnostics.writeStates.help: If enabled, diagnostics data is written to adapter states (diagnostics.*).

diagnostics.logLevel.label: Diagnostics log level
diagnostics.logLevel.help: Log level used for diagnostics output (adapter log).

diagnostics.logIntervalSec.label: Diagnostics log interval (sec)
diagnostics.logIntervalSec.help: Minimum seconds between diagnostics log lines (0 = every tick).

diagnostics.stateIntervalSec.label: Diagnostics state interval (sec)
diagnostics.stateIntervalSec.help: Minimum seconds between writing diagnostics states (0 = every tick).

diagnostics.alwaysOnError.label: Always log/write on error
diagnostics.alwaysOnError.help: If a module error occurs, diagnostics are logged/written immediately (ignores intervals).

diagnostics.maxJsonLen.label: Diagnostics max JSON length
diagnostics.maxJsonLen.help: Maximum length for JSON written to diagnostics states (prevents oversized states).

peakShaving.staleTimeoutSec.label: Meter stale timeout (s)
peakShaving.staleTimeoutSec.help: If meter values are older than this, Peak Shaving enters failsafe (STALE_METER) and will not release.

peakShaving.safetyMarginW.label: Safety margin (W)
peakShaving.safetyMarginW.help: Subtracts from the max power limit to keep headroom for meter delay and load spikes.

peakShaving.phaseMode.label: Phase decision mode
peakShaving.phaseMode.help: When 'enforce', phase current limits can activate peak shaving even without a power limit.

peakShaving.voltageV.label: Voltage (V)
peakShaving.voltageV.help: Used to estimate required reduction from phase over-current.

peakShaving.fastTripEnabled.label: Fast trip enabled
peakShaving.fastTripEnabled.help: If enabled, Peak Shaving can activate immediately on spikes, bypassing activate delay.

peakShaving.fastTripMode.label: Fast trip mode
peakShaving.fastTripMode.help: Select spike detector: max of recent window or current raw value.

peakShaving.allowedPowerId.label: Allowed max power (W) - State ID (optional)
peakShaving.allowedPowerId.help: Optional external limit (e.g. grid signal). In dynamic mode the effective limit is min(Max power, Allowed max power) minus Reserve.

peakShaving.reserveW.label: Reserve (W)
peakShaving.reserveW.help: Reserve that is subtracted from the effective limit in dynamic mode (e.g. keep headroom).

peakShaving.baseLoadPowerId.label: Base load / house consumption (W) - State ID (optional)
peakShaving.baseLoadPowerId.help: If set, the adapter also calculates the target power for controlled loads: availableForControlledW = effectiveLimit - (baseLoad - PV - Battery).

peakShaving.pvPowerId.label: PV power (W) - State ID (optional)
peakShaving.pvPowerId.help: PV generation power (W), positive. Used only for availableForControlledW calculation.

peakShaving.batteryPowerId.label: Battery power (W) - State ID (optional)
peakShaving.batteryPowerId.help: Battery discharge power (W), positive. Used only for availableForControlledW calculation.

peakShaving.l1CurrentId.label: Phase L1 current (A) - State ID
peakShaving.l1CurrentId.help: ioBroker state ID (optional). Leave empty if you map via global datapoints.

peakShaving.l2CurrentId.label: Phase L2 current (A) - State ID
peakShaving.l2CurrentId.help: ioBroker state ID (optional). Leave empty if you map via global datapoints.

peakShaving.l3CurrentId.label: Phase L3 current (A) - State ID
peakShaving.l3CurrentId.help: ioBroker state ID (optional). Leave empty if you map via global datapoints.

chargingManagement.totalBudgetMode.label: Total budget mode
chargingManagement.totalBudgetMode.help: Defines the total charging budget used for priority distribution.

chargingManagement.budgetPowerId.label: Budget power (W) - State ID (for fromDatapoint)
chargingManagement.budgetPowerId.help: If total budget mode is 'fromDatapoint', this state provides the budget in W.

chargingManagement.pauseWhenPeakShavingA.label: Pause charging management when Peak Shaving is active

chargingManagement.pauseBehavior.label: Pause behavior
chargingManagement.pauseBehavior.help: When paused by Peak Shaving: ramp down to 0 (safest) or follow Peak Shaving available budget.

chargingManagement.staleTimeoutSec.label: Meter stale timeout (s)
chargingManagement.staleTimeoutSec.help: If meter/budget values are older than this, Charging Management forces safe targets (STALE_METER).

chargingManagement.acMinPower3pW.label: AC 3p min power (W)
chargingManagement.acMinPower3pW.help: Minimum target power for 3-phase AC wallboxes. Typical: 4200 W.

chargingManagement.activityThresholdW.label: Activity threshold (W)
chargingManagement.activityThresholdW.help: A wallbox is considered 'charging' if its measured power is >= this threshold.

chargingManagement.stopGraceSec.label: Stop grace (s)
chargingManagement.stopGraceSec.help: Keep a wallbox in 'charging' state for this duration after power drops below threshold (prevents flapping).

chargingManagement.sessionKeepSec.label: Session keep time (s)
chargingManagement.sessionKeepSec.help: Keep the charging session timestamp for this duration after a charging session stops. If it resumes within this window, it keeps its original arrival order.

chargingManagement.maxDeltaWPerTick.label: Max delta per tick (W)
chargingManagement.maxDeltaWPerTick.help: Limits ramp-up per control cycle. Ramp-down is always immediate for safety.

chargingManagement.maxDeltaAPerTick.label: Max delta per tick (A)
chargingManagement.maxDeltaAPerTick.help: Limits ramp-up per control cycle in amperes. Ramp-down is always immediate for safety.

chargingManagement.stepW.label: Step (W)
chargingManagement.stepW.help: Quantize setpoints to this step size (rounded down). Set 0 to disable.

chargingManagement.stepA.label: Step (A)
chargingManagement.stepA.help: Quantize current setpoints to this step size (rounded down). Set 0 to disable.

items.help: auto: AC uses setCurrentA if present else setPowerW; DC uses setPowerW.
items.title: Control basis

storage.controlMode.label: Steuerungsart Speicher
storage.controlMode.help: Wähle, wie der Speicher angesteuert werden kann. Die benötigten Datenpunkte hängen vom Modus ab.

storage.datapoints.socScale.label: SoC Umrechnungsfaktor
storage.datapoints.socScale.help: Standard 1. Beispiel: Wenn der Speicher 0–1 liefert, dann 100 eintragen.

storage.datapoints.batteryPowerObjectId.label: Speicher Ist-Leistung (W) – Datenpunkt-ID
storage.datapoints.batteryPowerObjectId.help: Optional. Hilft für Diagnose und spätere Regelung.

storage.datapoints.batteryPowerInvert.label: Ist-Leistung Vorzeichen umdrehen
storage.datapoints.batteryPowerInvert.help: Aktivieren, wenn Laden/Entladen im Datenpunkt anders herum ist.

storage.staleTimeoutSec.label: Messwert-Timeout (Sekunden)
storage.staleTimeoutSec.help: Wenn Messwerte älter sind als dieser Wert, wird der Speicher auf 0 gesetzt (Sicherheit).

storage.maxChargeW.label: Maximale Ladeleistung (W)
storage.maxChargeW.help: Begrenzung für Lade-Leistung, wenn der Adapter aktiv regelt (Sollleistung).

storage.maxDischargeW.label: Maximale Entladeleistung (W)
storage.maxDischargeW.help: Begrenzung für Entlade-Leistung, wenn der Adapter aktiv regelt (Sollleistung).

storage.stepW.label: Schrittweite (W)
storage.stepW.help: Rundet die Sollleistung auf diese Schrittweite. 0 = keine Rundung.

storage.maxDeltaWPerTick.label: Maximale Änderung je Takt (W)
storage.maxDeltaWPerTick.help: Begrenzt, wie schnell sich die Sollleistung pro Takt ändern darf.

storage.reserveEnabled.label: Notstrom-Reserve aktivieren
storage.reserveEnabled.help: Wenn aktiv, wird Entladen unterhalb des Mindest-SoC verhindert.

storage.reserveMinSocPct.label: Mindest-SoC für Entladen (%)
storage.reserveMinSocPct.help: Unterhalb dieses SoC entlädt der Adapter den Speicher nicht mehr.

storage.pvEnabled.label: PV-Überschuss laden
storage.pvEnabled.help: Wenn aktiv, lädt der Adapter bei Netz-Einspeisung (negativer Netzbezug) den Speicher.

storage.pvExportThresholdW.label: PV-Überschuss-Schwelle (W)
storage.pvExportThresholdW.help: Erst ab dieser Einspeiseleistung wird geladen (zur Vermeidung von Flattern).

storage.datapoints.targetPowerObjectId.label: Speicher Sollleistung (W) – Datenpunkt-ID
storage.datapoints.targetPowerObjectId.help: Nur Modus „Sollleistung (W)“. Empfehlung: negativ = Laden, positiv = Entladen (bei Bedarf Vorzeichen umdrehen).

storage.datapoints.targetPowerInvert.label: Sollleistung Vorzeichen umdrehen
storage.datapoints.targetPowerInvert.help: Aktivieren, wenn der Speicher eine andere Vorzeichen-Regel erwartet.

storage.datapoints.reserveSocObjectId.label: Reserve-SoC (%) – Datenpunkt-ID
storage.datapoints.reserveSocObjectId.help: Optional. Wenn der Speicher eine Reserve direkt unterstützt.

storage.info.text: Diese Zuordnung ist herstellerunabhängig. Der Adapter nutzt die Datenpunkte später für Lastspitzenkappung, Eigenverbrauch, Notstrom-Reserve und Tarif. Der Ladepark bleibt im Adapter und wird gemeinsam mit dem Speicher geregelt.
